attacks.name: Calamity Storm
attacks.effect: You may discard a Stadium in play. If you do, this attack does 120 more damage.

abilities.name: Subjugating Chains
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch 1 of your Benched {D} Pokémon, except any Pecharunt ex, with your Active Pokémon. If you do, the new Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. You can't use more than 1 Subjugating Chains Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Irritated Outburst
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.name: Coin Bonus
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may draw a card. If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, draw 1 more card.

attacks.name: Make It Rain
attacks.effect: Discard any number of Basic Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Phantom Dive
attacks.effect: Put 6 damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Burst Roar
attacks.effect: Discard your hand and draw 6 cards.

attacks.name: Bellowing Thunder
attacks.effect: You may discard any amount of Basic Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 70 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

abilities.name: Rainbow DNA
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can evolve into any Pokémon ex that evolves from Eevee if you play it from your hand onto this Pokémon. (This Pokémon can't evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.)

abilities.name: Seasoned Skill
abilities.effect: Blood Moon used by this Pokémon costs {C} less for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: Blood Moon
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Unified Beatdown
attacks.effect: If you go second, you can't use this attack during your first turn. This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crown Opal
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic non-{C} Pokémon.

cards.name: Amarys
cards.effect: Draw 4 cards. At the end of this turn, if you have 5 or more cards in your hand, discard your hand.

cards.name: Crispin
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards of different types, reveal them, and put 1 of them into your hand. Attach the other to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Drayton
cards.effect: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon and a Trainer card you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Janine's Secret Art
cards.effect: Choose up to 2 of your {D} Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Basic {D} Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. If you attached Energy to your Active Pokémon in this way, it is now Poisoned.

cards.name: Kieran
cards.effect:
Choose 1:

• Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

• During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex and Active Pokémon V (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Lacey
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, draw 8 cards instead.

abilities.name: Rapid Vernier
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon. If you do, you may move any amount of Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prism Edge
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Teal Dance
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic {G} Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw a card.

attacks.name: Myriad Leaf Shower
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Azure Seas
abilities.effect: Damage from attacks used by this Pokémon isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Catharsis Roar
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 120 more damage.

abilities.name: Resolute Heart
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has full HP and would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, it is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

attacks.name: Topaz Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Unified Beatdown
attacks.effect: If you go second, you can't use this attack during your first turn. This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crown Opal
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic non-{C} Pokémon.
